items.sentence: My son is playing with his drone in the yard.
I shouldn't be the one to make this decision.
Let's hope this cold spell doesn't last long.
The nurse cleaned and then dressed the wound.
I'm afraid the inflammation is getting worse.
Tom promised me that he wouldn't do it again.
Frankly speaking, I don't like Tom very much.
The question is whether Tom can do it or not.
I had no idea how many people would be there.
I don't know where we'll be living next year.
